mapper.insert: insert into sd_traffic_volume( tunnel_id, create_by, direction, car_number, original_data, remark, create_time )values( #{tunnelId}, #{createBy}, #{direction}, #{carNumber}, #{originalData}, #{remark}, sysdate() )

mapper.select: SELECT max( tv.original_data + 0) AS originalData, tv.direction, max( tv.create_time ) AS create_time FROM sd_traffic_volume tv WHERE 1 = 1 AND tv.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId} AND DATE_FORMAT( tv.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d' ) GROUP BY tv.direction ORDER BY tv.direction ASC LIMIT 2

SELECT tv.tunnel_id AS tunnelId, tv.direction, sum( tv.car_number ) AS carNum,
DATE_FORMAT( tv.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00' ) DATE_FORMAT( tv.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00' ) DATE_FORMAT( tv.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00' ) DATE_FORMAT( tv.create_time, '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) DATE_FORMAT( tv.create_time, '%Y-01-01 00:00:00' ) AS carTime, t.tunnel_name AS tunnelName, #{dateType} AS dateType FROM sd_traffic_volume tv LEFT JOIN sd_tunnels t on tv.tunnel_id = t.tunnel_id WHERE 1 = 1 and tv.direction = #{direction} and tv.tunnel_id =#{tunnelId} and tv.id = #{id} and FIND_IN_SET(tv.id, #{ids}) > 0
